pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayes Estimation of Latent Class Mixed Multinomial Probit Models // Fitting latent class mixed multinomial probit (LCMMNP) models to simulated or empirical choice data via Bayesian estimation. The number of latent classes can be updated within the algorithm on a weight-based strategy. For a reference on the method see Oelschlaeger and Bauer (2021) https://trid.trb.org/view/1759753.
